paragraph.paragraph: Assembly nodes, depicted by the common ../images/assembly/assembly.ico icon, match the ../../eiffelenvision_projects/structure/references/references_folder.xmlComponent References compiled into a project when last ../../compiling_projects/index.xmlBuilt. EiffelEnvision only will show the references from the last build because of the task of performing ../../../../../technologies/dotnet/eiffel_dotnet_language/20_language/90_assembly_formatting.xmlReferenced Assembly Type and Feature Name Conversion, done as compilation-time.

Expanding each assembly nodes will yield a flat list of namespaces found in the corresponding assembly. Namespace, just like in the vxurfObjectBrowserS 0 Visual Studio .NET Object Browser , are denoted by the ../images/assembly/namespace.ico icon. In turn, expanding a namespace node will yield a list of types.xml.NET Type Nodes contained within the corresponding namespace.

link.label: Visual Studio .NET Class View and Object Browser Icons
